SavedLv2_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:Happy>You're more capable than you look!
I didn't get a single scratch on me
thanks to you. Sarqso!
Talk_17:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:QuestionNormal>What is it? Are you trying to ask me out
to that <clr:0000>restaurant<clr:ffff>?
Talk_18:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>Well, I'm afraid you picked the wrong vai.
Not to mention the wrong restaurant.<sp:0:4:0>The food there might make the Gorons
swoon, but I can't manage a single bite of
those roasts.
Talk_19:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Those roasts might make the Gorons
swoon, but it would take more than a
meal to win my heart.
No offense—I just like my voe to have a
little meat on their bones.
Talk_20:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Perhaps you were hoping to win my
heart with one of those roasts that's
making the Gorons swoon. Is that it?
Well, I'm afraid you'll have to invite
someone else. I couldn't eat another bite.<sp:0:4:0>Besides, no offense, but I like my voe to
have a little meat on their bones.
Talk_21:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>I'm going to try eating another roast at
that restaurant.<sp:0:4:0>Hopefully this one won't be as hard to
chew. Last time, I nearly chipped a tooth.
Talk_22:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>Are you eating at the <clr:0000>restaurant<clr:ffff> as well?<sp:0:4:0>Well, then. Aren't you going to buy me a
meal? <sp:5:1:0>I'd hate to eat alone...<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:LaughS>Ahaha! I'm just joking. Please, no need to
look so petrified.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0a00><snd:Think_00>Even if you were interested, the roast
they serve here is not my idea of a
romantic meal.
I don't even think I can eat it.
Atacked00:
<snd:Happy>You arrived at just the right time!
Mind lending me a hand?
Talk_23:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>If you're hoping to win my heart,
you won't do it with the roasts they
serve here...<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0900><snd:SurpriseS_00>I told you, I'm joking! Were you born
without a sense of humor, or did you
misplace it somehow?<sp:5:1:0>
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>Anyway, whether or not I'll be wooed by
this food is beside the point. I can hardly
eat it.<sp:0:4:0>I can't believe I put off searching for voe
to come here.
Atacked01:
<snd:Happy>Did you come to lend me a hand?
Much obliged!
Talk_24:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>Why did I put off searching for voe just
to eat here? What a mistake that was.
Talk_26:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:QuestionNormal>Are you going to that <clr:0000>restaurant <clr:ffff>at the
top of the hill?<sp:0:4:0>Or perhaps it isn't food you hunger for.
Could it be you have an appetite for<sp:5:0:0>...me?<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:LaughS>Ahaha! I'm just joking. Please, no need to
look so petrified.<sp:0:4:0>I'm interested in the roast, which I hear is
very popular among Gorons lately.

They say the flavor breaks your heart—<sp:5:0:0>
and the texture breaks your teeth!

One can't search for voe on an empty
stomach. I need a good, filling meal to
keep me going.
Guardian00:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Scare>I know better than to push my luck.
I'm running away, and you should too!
Failed00:
<sp:3:0:2:0300><snd:Sad>I thought it was over for me.<sp:5:0:0> I wish you'd
arrived a little sooner...
Talk_29:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>Look at that shop owner chow down.<sp:5:1:0>
You can tell he loves the stuff.

Me? <sp:5:1:0>I could scarcely make a dent in it.


And to think I put off my search for voe to
eat here. What a mistake that was.
SavedLv3_00:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:Happy>Just when I was prepared to face my end,
you saved me.<sp:5:0:0> Sarqso!
Failed01:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00><snd:Sad>I can't soak in the hot springs with these
wounds all over me...
Thanks00:
<sp:3:0:2:0801>Here's something to thank you for coming
to my rescue.
Talk_30: <sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Greeting>Are you eating at the <clr:0000>restaurant<clr:ffff> as well?
SavedLv1_00:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:Happy>Are they gone already?<sp:5:0:0> Sarqso! You've
been a real help.
Talk_31:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:LaughS>Before coming here, I didn't realize what
Gorons ate.

When I saw all the rock roast here,
I thought I'd have to turn around and
eat somewhere else!
Thankfully, they also serve steaks suitable
for non-Gorons.
Near_03: I'm glad I can eat here.
SavedLv1_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Happy>Sarqso.<sp:5:0:0> That might have gotten dicey if
you hadn't arrived.
Talk_03:

very popular among Gorons lately.

One can't search for voe on an empty
stomach. I need a good, filling meal to
keep me going.
Near_04: I came so far, for what?
Talk_32:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Greeting>Did you also come to eat at
the <clr:0000>restaurant<clr:ffff>?
Talk_04:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:QuestionNormal>We meet again. You really want to ask me
out to that <clr:0000>restaurant<clr:ffff>, don't you?
Talk_33:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Sorry, do you mind? I need to get
somewhere dry.

I love a good shower, <sp:5:0:0>but not like this!
Talk_05:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:QuestionNormal>We meet again. You really want to ask me
out to that <clr:0000>restaurant at the top of the

Talk_11:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>Are you going to get a steak at the
<clr:0000>restaurant <clr:ffff>on the mountain?<sp:0:4:0>Or perhaps it isn't food you hunger for.
Could it be you have an appetite for<sp:5:1:0>...me?<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:LaughS>Ahaha! I'm just joking. Please, no need to
